title: Haryana Govt Jobs 2017 – 106 Salesman, Officer & Other Posts

organizations.name: civil aviation department haryana vacancy details
maintenance of electrical motors & installation for post
haryana seeds development corporation limited payable

text: 7. Junior Mechanic: 05 Posts 8. Electrician: 01 Post 9. AMO: 02 Posts Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Matric for Post 1, B.Sc. Agril. with 2nd Class or M.Sc. Agriculture with specialization in Plant Breeding, Agronomy or Seed Technology with minimum two years experience in Seed Production/ Processing/ Certification for Post 2, Commerce Graduate with one year experience in some Govt. Office/ Commercial concern for Post 3, at least Graduate with Computer typing knowledge for Post 4, possess driving licence or Light/Heavy Vehicle and have experience of driving two years at least, Knowing English/ Hindi Middle Standard for Post 5, 10+2. Minimum speed of 80 WPM and 30 WPM in English Shorthand & Typing and 60 WPM and 20 WPM in Hindi Shorthand & Typing respectively for Post 6, ITI Diploma or equivalent qualification from a Technical Training Institute for Post 7, ITI Certificate of two years in Electric/ Wireman with knowledge of Maintenance of Electrical Motors & Installation for Post 8, B.Sc (Agril.) with at least 5 years experience of Marketing Agril. Products in Govt./Semi Govt. of a firm of repute. In case of Graduate (BSC in Agril.) with diploma in Marketing minimum experience required would be 3 yrs or MBA specialization in marketing management with at least 3 years experience for Post 9. Selection Process: Selection will be based on written test, interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.50/- in case of SC/ST and Rs. 100/- for others categories in favour of Haryana Seeds Development Corporation Limited Payable at Panchkula. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application on plain paper along with one passport size photograph, copies of Educational Certificates, Experience Certificate and Date of Birth, fee to the o/o Managing Director, Haryana Seeds Development Corporation Limited, Bays 3-6, Sector 2, Panchkula through Registered Post/ Speed Post on or before 31-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 31-03-2017. For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt – Civil Aviation Department Haryana Jobs 2017 – Flight Dispatcher Posts: Govt. of Haryana, Civil Aviation Department, Haryana has announced a notification for the recruitment of Flight Dispatcher vacancies on regular basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 12-04-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification & how to apply are given below…. Civil Aviation Department Haryana Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Flight Dispatcher Age Limit: Candidates age should be 20 to 42 years. Educational Qualification: Candidates should posses 10+2 with Science or its equivalent, with knowledge of Hindi/ Sanskrit up to Matric standard or Higher Education, Computer & relevant experience. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application on plain paper giving complete Bio-Data, attested copies of certificates, testimonials, license, other relevant documents with latest photograph to the Adviser, Civil Aviation Haryana, 30 Bays Building, Sector 17-B, Chandigarh-160 017 on or before 12-04-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 12-04-2017. For more details like pay band & other information click on the link given below….
